params.contentRef: The content whose annotations to accept.

params.author: The author of the change.
params.contentRef: Hash of the content being annotated.
params.scope: The scope/range of the change within the content.

returns._0: pendingIds Array of pending annotation IDs.

params.contentRef: The content whose annotations to reject.
The content to toggle tracking for.

accept(bytes32).notice: Accept an annotation, marking it as applied.

acceptAll(bytes32).notice: Accept all pending annotations for a content reference.

annotate(bytes32,string,bytes,bytes32).notice: Create an annotation for a content change.

getContentAnnotations(bytes32).notice: Get all annotation IDs for a content reference.

isTrackingEnabled(bytes32).notice: Check whether tracking is enabled for a content reference.

listPending(bytes32).notice: List all pending annotation IDs for a content reference.

reject(bytes32).notice: Reject an annotation, discarding the change.

rejectAll(bytes32).notice: Reject all pending annotations for a content reference.

toggleTracking(bytes32,bool).notice: Toggle change tracking for a content reference.
